fifteenpuzzle.searchalgorithm

Class Astar

  • java.lang.Object
    • fifteenpuzzle.searchalgorithm.Astar

  • public class Astar
extends java.lang.Object
    Astar Class. this class uses A* algorithm to find the least amount of movements to solve the puzzle. It's like Dijkstra but it uses heuristic to go towards solutions. Here is used Manhattan Distance as heuristic to evaluate direction.
